amendment.description: To require an assessment of United States manufacturing surge capacity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2243 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4190) To require an assessment of United States manufacturing surge capacity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2243 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
